title: What's in a name? If you're Richard Braine, endless mockery...
text:
What’s in a name? Endless scope for ridicule, even during recess – if you’re Dick Braine, anyway. Sorry that’s Richard Braine who, since being elected as UKIP leader this week, has been the subject of merciless mockery. He is “getting very fed up” of the insults, as per an item on a breakfast show presented by Richard Madeley yesterday morning, where a fellow Dick apparently failed to share his woes.

The troubles began when Gideon “George” Osborne (the Gideon is silent) landed the first blow on Twitter, seeming to imply that someone whose name was a bit silly was not suitable for political office. Dick – Richard! Richard Braine! – was swift with his rebuttal, telling the former Chancellor that...
